dcterms:creator: Jonathan Light

dcterms:description: Avalon is a social role-playing game based on deduction that heavily relies on conversation, making it an excellent test bed due to its goal-driven objectives and complex mechanisms, which facilitates social interactions among LLMs within a detailed, grounded environment.
dcterms:title: Avalon

dcterms:description: The Social Intelligence Data Infrastructure provides a structured approach to understanding and navigating social intelligence in various contexts.
dcterms:title: Social Intelligence Data Infrastructure

dcterms:description: The Theory of Mind Dataset evaluates the ability to understand others' beliefs, intentions, and thoughts through question answering.
dcterms:title: Theory of Mind Dataset

dcterms:description: The Social Reasoning Dataset assesses the ability of machines to learn from humans and assist in human learning through social interactions.
